description: The Den`an Zon is the first of the miniaturized mobile suits produced by the http://anidb.net/ch1738 [Crossbone Vanguard]. Based on the experimental Dessa type developed by the civilian company http://anidb.net/ch1740 [Buch Aerodynamics], this compact machine boasts superb performance and introduces new technologies such as the beam shield and the goggle-style hybrid dual sensor. Designed for close-range combat, the Den`an Zon is armed with a shot lancer that can penetrate enemy armor without triggering a devastating reactor explosion.
name: Den`an Zon
